Name: age
Description: The age of the individual.

Name: average_monthly_salary_1y
Description: The individual's average monthly salary for the last year.

Name: average_monthly_salary_3y
Description: The individual's average monthly salary for the last three years.

Name: average_monthly_salary_5y
Description: The individual's average monthly salary for the last five years.

Name: base_salary_last
Description: The user's latest base salary. If `current_status` is `EMPLOYED`, this is the user's current base salary.

Name: collected_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp when the data point was collected.

Name: created_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the data point was created in Belvo's database.

Name: current_employer_count
Description: The number of employers the individual has right now.

Name: current_status
Description:
Indicates the employment status of the individual. We return one of the following responses:
  
  - `EMPLOYED`
  - `RETIRED`
  - `UNEMPLOYED`
  - `null`

Name: decreases_1y
Description: The total number of salary decreases throughout the individual's last year (YTD).

Name: decreases_3y
Description:
The total number of salary decreases throughout the individual's last three years.

> **Note:**
>
>  If the individual's working career is less than three years, we return `null`.

Name: decreases_5y
Description:
The total number of salary decreases throughout the individual's last five years.

> **Note:**
>
>  If the individual's working career is less than five years, we return `null`.

Name: decreases_after_change
Description: The total number of salary decreases between the individual's penultimate job and the last (or current) job.

Name: decreases_last_job
Description: The total number of salary increases the user had in their last job. If `current_status` is `EMPLOYED`, this refers to the user's current job.

Name: decreases_overall
Description: The total number of salary decreases throughout the individual's working career.

Name: employer_count
Description: The total number of employers the user has had. Useful to indicate employment stability over the course of their lifetime.

Name: employers_per_year
Description:
Number of employers per year. Useful to indicate employment stability over the course of a year.

> **Note:**
>
> If the user left one company and returned, for example, six months later to the same company, this is counted as one employer.

Name: id
Description: Belvo's unique identifier for the current item.

Name: increases_1y
Description: The total number of salary increases throughout the individual's last year (YTD).

Name: increases_3y
Description:
The total number of salary increases throughout the individual's last three years.

> **Note:**
>
>  If the individual's working career is less than three years, we return `null`.

Name: increases_5y
Description:
The total number of salary increases throughout the individual's last five years.

> **Note:**
>
>  If the individual's working career is less than five years, we return `null`.

Name: increases_after_change
Description: The total number of salary increases between the individual's penultimate job and the last (or current) job.

Name: increases_last_job
Description:
The total number of salary increases the user had in their last job. If `current_status` is `EMPLOYED`, this refers to the user's current job.

> **Note:**
>
> For all salary increases or decreases, we only take into account those where the change in salary is greater than 2%.

Name: increases_overall
Description: The total number of salary increases throughout the individual's working career.

Name: link
Description: The `link.id` the data belongs to.

Name: max_monthly_salary_1y
Description: The individual's maximum monthly salary for the last year.

Name: max_monthly_salary_3y
Description: The individual's maximum monthly salary for the last three years.

Name: max_monthly_salary_5y
Description: The individual's maximum monthly salary for the last five years.

Name: max_weeks_between_jobs
Description: The maximum number of weeks that the individual was unemployed.

Name: min_monthly_salary_1y
Description: The individual's minimum monthly salary for the last year.

Name: min_monthly_salary_3y
Description: The individual's minimum monthly salary for the last three years.

Name: min_monthly_salary_5y
Description: The individual's minimum monthly salary for the last five years.

Name: reference_date
Description:
The reference_date your provided in your request. If you didn't provide one, this field will return `null`, indicating that the calculations are performed up until the date of the request.

**Note:** All calculations are relative to this date.

Name: unique_employer_count
Description:
The number of unique employers that the individual has had.

> **Note:**
>
> If the user left one company and returned, for example, six months later to the same company, this is counted as one employer.

Name: updated_at
Description: The ISO-8601 timestamp of when the employment metrics calculation was last updated.

Name: weeks_between_jobs
Description: The total number of weeks the individual was unemployed.

Name: weeks_employed_last_job
Description: The number of weeks the user was employed in their last job. If `current_status` is `EMPLOYED`, then this field indicates the number of weeks the user has been employed with his current job.

Name: weeks_employed_total
Description:
The total number of weeks the user has been employed, according to the institution.

> **Note:**
>
> In the case that the user is employed at two or more places at the same time, we still calculate those weeks as one week. For example, if a user has three concurrent jobs for a month, this is calculated as 4 weeks.

Name: weeks_since_last_job
Description: The number of weeks since their last job. If the value of this field is `0`, this indicates that the user is currently employed.

Name: weeks_with_multiple_employers
Description: The number of the weeks that the individual has had more than one employer at the same time.

Name: yearly_change_1y
Description: The individual's salary percentage change for the last year (YTD).

Name: yearly_change_3y
Description:
The individual's salary percentage change for the last three years.

> **Note:**
>
>  If the individual's working career is less than three years, we return `null`.

Name: yearly_change_5y
Description:
The individual's salary percentage change for the last five years.

> **Note:**
>
>  If the individual's working career is less than five years, we return `null`.
